alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Flagler; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Clay; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Clay; Western Duval; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 1:44PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms, with very heavy rainfall, will impact portions of Flagler, east central Nassau, St. Johns, central Clay and Duval Counties through 245 PM EDT... At 143 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Little Talbot Island to Flagler Beach. Movement was south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Palm Coast, Saint Augustine, Orange Park, Green Cove Springs, Flagler Beach, Bunnell, Hastings, Jacksonville International Arpt and Arlington. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Heavy rainfall is occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
